Actions.Name: Strafe Shot
Actions.Effects: May dash 1 before and after the attack. Ignores cover and deals bonus damage against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Double Tap
Actions.Description: The Aeronaut flies 3 spaces in a straight line. At the start and end of their movement, they may deal [fray] damage to a character in range 3, choosing different characters each time.

Actions.Name: Blinding Grenade
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is blinded. Blinded foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Takeoff
Actions.Description: The Aeronaut launches into the air. While in this stance, they are flying and have evasion. They lose this stance if they are hit by an attack.
